metadata.description: Not used, but needed to pass arm-ttk test `Location-Should-Not-Be-Hardcoded`.  We instead use the `workspace-location` which is derived from the LA workspace
[concat('Region to deploy solution resources -- separate from location selection',parameters('location'))]
Workspace name for Log Analytics where Microsoft Sentinel is setup

properties.description: This rule creates an incident when more than certain number of Dnsniff events are generated from a host
properties.query: ForescoutHostProperties_CL | extend  d = parse_json(HostProperties) | where d.DnsniffEvent matches regex "DNS Query Type:.A;DNS Query/Response:.Query" | extend ipaddress = iif(isnotempty(Ipv4Addr), Ipv4Addr, (iif(isnotempty(Ipv6Addr), Ipv6Addr, ""))) | where isnotempty(ipaddress) and isnotempty(EmIpAddr) | summarize NumEvents_d =count() by ipaddress, EmIpAddr | where NumEvents_d > 2 | sort by NumEvents_d asc | project NumEvents_d, ipaddress, EmIpAddr

properties.description: ForescoutHostPropertyMonitor data connector with template version 3.0.0

connectorUiConfig.title: Forescout Host Property Monitor
connectorUiConfig.descriptionMarkdown: The Forescout Host Property Monitor connector allows you to connect host/policy/compliance properties from Forescout platform with Microsoft Sentinel, to view, create custom incidents, and improve investigation. This gives you more insight into your organization network and improves your security operation capabilities.

dataTypes.name: ForescoutHostProperties_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
ForescoutHostProperties_CL
            | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

dataTypes.name: ForescoutPolicyStatus_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
ForescoutPolicyStatus_CL
            | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

dataTypes.name: ForescoutComplianceStatus_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
ForescoutComplianceStatus_CL
            | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

value:
ForescoutHostProperties_CL
            | summarize LastLogReceived = max(TimeGenerated)
            | project IsConnected = LastLogReceived > ago(30d)

ForescoutPolicyStatus_CL
            | summarize LastLogReceived = max(TimeGenerated)
            | project IsConnected = LastLogReceived > ago(30d)

ForescoutComplianceStatus_CL
            | summarize LastLogReceived = max(TimeGenerated)
            | project IsConnected = LastLogReceived > ago(30d)

resourceProvider.permissionsDisplayText: read and write permissions are required.

read permissions to shared keys for the workspace are required. [See the documentation to learn more about workspace keys](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/platform/agent-windows#obtain-workspace-id-and-key).

customs.name: Forescout Plugin requirement
customs.description: Please make sure Forescout Microsoft Sentinel plugin is running on Forescout platform

instructionSteps.description: Instructions on how to configure Forescout Microsoft Sentinel plugin are provided at Forescout Documentation Portal (https://docs.forescout.com/bundle/microsoft-sentinel-module-v2-0-0-h)

metadata.description: Gain insights into host properties in Forescout platform

properties.serializedData:
{"version":"Notebook/1.0","items":[{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"ForescoutHostProperties_CL 
| sort by TimeGenerated
| extend hostID = strcat(Ipv4Addr, MacAddr)
| extend TimeGenerated = startofday(TimeGenerated)
| distinct TimeGenerated, hostID
| summarize count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1d)","size":0,"aggregation":2,"showAnalytics":true,"title":"Unique Devices Seen per Day","timeContext":{"durationMs":2592000000},"showRefreshButton":true,"showExportToExcel":true,"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","visualization":"timechart","chartSettings":{"xSettings":{"label":"Day"},"ySettings":{"label":"Count"}}},"name":"query - 1"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"ForescoutHostProperties_CL 
| where HostProperties has "VendorClassification"
| extend hostID = strcat(Ipv4Addr, MacAddr)
| extend prop = tostring(HostProperties.VendorClassification[0])
| distinct hostID, prop
| summarize count() by prop","size":0,"showAnalytics":true,"title":"Vendors Seen over last 24 Hours","timeContext":{"durationMs":86400000},"showRefreshButton":true,"showExportToExcel":true,"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","visualization":"piechart","chartSettings":{"group":"prop","createOtherGroup":20}},"customWidth":"33","name":"query - 1","styleSettings":{"showBorder":true}},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"ForescoutHostProperties_CL 
| where HostProperties has "FunctionClassification"
| extend hostID = strcat(Ipv4Addr, MacAddr)
| extend prop = tostring(HostProperties.FunctionClassification[0])
| distinct hostID, prop
| summarize count() by prop
| sort by count_","size":0,"showAnalytics":true,"title":"Function Seen over last 24 Hours","timeContext":{"durationMs":86400000},"showRefreshButton":true,"showExportToExcel":true,"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","visualization":"piechart","chartSettings":{"group":"prop","createOtherGroup":20}},"customWidth":"33","name":"query - 1 - Copy","styleSettings":{"showBorder":true}},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"ForescoutHostProperties_CL 
| where HostProperties has "ModelClassification"
| extend hostID = strcat(Ipv4Addr, MacAddr)
| extend prop = tostring(HostProperties.ModelClassification[0])
| distinct hostID, prop
| summarize count() by prop
| sort by count_","size":0,"showAnalytics":true,"title":"Model Seen over last 24 Hours","timeContext":{"durationMs":86400000},"showRefreshButton":true,"showExportToExcel":true,"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","visualization":"piechart","chartSettings":{"group":"prop","createOtherGroup":20}},"customWidth":"33","name":"query - 1 - Copy - Copy","styleSettings":{"showBorder":true}},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"ForescoutHostProperties_CL 
| where HostProperties has "MemberOfGroup"
| where HostProperties.MemberOfGroup contains "C2C-1.1-USCYBERCOM"
| extend prop = extract("C2C-1.1-USCYBERCOM-([^,]+)", 1, tostring(HostProperties.MemberOfGroup))
| extend hostID = strcat(Ipv4Addr, MacAddr)
| distinct hostID, prop
| summarize count() by prop","size":0,"title":"Devices by USCYBERCOM Group Memership over last 24 Hours","timeContext":{"durationMs":86400000},"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","visualization":"barchart"},"name":"query - 4"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"ForescoutHostProperties_CL 
| where HostProperties has "OtsmDetailsCves"
| extend Vuln = parse_json(HostProperties.OtsmDetailsCves)
| mv-expand Vuln
| extend Vuln = trim_end("}" ,substring(Vuln, 1))
| distinct Ipv4Addr, MacAddr, Vuln
//| extend Vuln = split(Vuln, ", ")
| parse-kv Vuln as (vendor_specific_id: string, cvss_score: real, title: string, cve_id: string) with (pair_delimiter=', ', kv_delimiter='=')
| summarize Vuln_Count=count(), Total_CVSS = sum(cvss_score) by Ipv4Addr | sort by Total_CVSS","size":0,"title":"Most Vulnerable Devices","timeContext":{"durationMs":86400000},"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces"},"customWidth":"33","name":"query - 5"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"ForescoutHostProperties_CL 
| where HostProperties has "OtsmDetailsCves"
| extend Vuln = parse_json(HostProperties.OtsmDetailsCves)
| mv-expand Vuln
| extend Vuln = trim_end("}" ,substring(Vuln, 1))
| distinct Ipv4Addr, MacAddr, Vuln
| parse-kv Vuln as (vendor_specific_id: string, cvss_score: real, title: string, cve_id: string, id: string) with (pair_delimiter=', ', kv_delimiter='=')
| summarize Vuln_Count=count() by id | sort by Vuln_Count","size":0,"title":"Most Common CVEs","timeContext":{"durationMs":86400000},"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces"},"customWidth":"33","name":"query - 5 - Copy"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"ForescoutHostProperties_CL 
| where HostProperties has "OtsmDetailsCves"
| extend Vuln = parse_json(HostProperties.OtsmDetailsCves)
| mv-expand Vuln
| extend Vuln = trim_end("}" ,substring(Vuln, 1))
| distinct Ipv4Addr, MacAddr, Vuln
| parse-kv Vuln as (vendor_specific_id: string, cvss_score: real, title: string, cve_id: string, id: string) with (pair_delimiter=', ', kv_delimiter='=')
| distinct Ipv4Addr, MacAddr, id, cvss_score, ['title']","size":0,"title":"CVE List","timeContext":{"durationMs":86400000},"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces"},"customWidth":"33","name":"query - 5 - Copy - Copy"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"ForescoutComplianceStatus_CL
| mv-expand ComplianceStatus
| extend Compliance = tostring(ComplianceStatus)
| distinct Ipv4Addr, MacAddr, Compliance
| extend policy_name = extract('{"([^"]*)":"([^"]*)"}', 1, Compliance)
| extend status = extract('{"([^"]*)":"([^"]*)"}', 2, Compliance)
| summarize Count=count() by status","size":3,"title":"Overall Compliance (by Policy)","timeContext":{"durationMs":86400000},"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","visualization":"piechart"},"customWidth":"50","name":"query - 9","styleSettings":{"showBorder":true}},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"ForescoutComplianceStatus_CL
| mv-expand ComplianceStatus
| extend Compliance = tostring(ComplianceStatus)
| distinct Ipv4Addr, MacAddr, Compliance
| extend policy_name = extract('{"([^"]*)":"([^"]*)"}', 1, Compliance)
| extend status = extract('{"([^"]*)":"([^"]*)"}', 2, Compliance)
| where status contains "Not"
| summarize Count=count() by policy_name","size":0,"title":"Most Non-Compliant Policies","timeContext":{"durationMs":86400000},"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces"},"customWidth":"50","name":"query - 8"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"ForescoutPolicyStatus_CL
| mv-expand PolicyStatus
| extend Policy = tostring(PolicyStatus)
| extend Status = extract('.*"Status":"([^"]*)".*', 1, Policy)
| extend DetectedTime = extract('.*"DetectedTime":"([^"]*)".*', 1, Policy)
| extend PolicyName = extract('.*"PolicyName":"([^"]*)".*', 1, Policy)
| extend RuleName = extract('.*"RuleName":"([^"]*)".*', 1, Policy)
| where Status startswith "Match"
| distinct Ipv4Addr, MacAddr, RuleName
| summarize count() by RuleName | sort by count_","size":0,"title":"Number of Hosts Meeting Each Policy","timeContext":{"durationMs":86400000},"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces"},"customWidth":"50","name":"query - 10"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"ForescoutPolicyStatus_CL
| mv-expand PolicyStatus
| extend Policy = tostring(PolicyStatus)
| extend Status = extract('.*"Status":"([^"]*)".*', 1, Policy)
| extend DetectedTime = extract('.*"DetectedTime":"([^"]*)".*', 1, Policy)
| extend PolicyName = extract('.*"PolicyName":"([^"]*)".*', 1, Policy)
| extend RuleName = extract('.*"RuleName":"([^"]*)".*', 1, Policy)
| extend RuleName = extract("[^\\/]*/(.*)", 1, RuleName)
| where PolicyName == "C2C-0.1.0 Reporting - USCYBERCOM Device Category"
| where Status startswith "Match"
| extend hostID = strcat(Ipv4Addr, MacAddr)
| extend TimeGenerated = startofday(TimeGenerated)
| distinct hostID, TimeGenerated, RuleName
| summarize count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1d),RuleName | sort by count_","size":0,"title":"Device Distribution for  "C2C-0.1.0 Reporting - USCYBERCOM Device Category" Policy","timeContext":{"durationMs":2592000000},"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","visualization":"areachart"},"customWidth":"50","name":"query - 11"}],"fallbackResourceIds":["/subscriptions/f177fc07-1680-4da4-a994-201b82b973c1/resourcegroups/demo-lab-tx/providers/microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces/dod-demo-va"],"fromTemplateId":"sentinel-UserWorkbook","$schema":"https://github.com/Microsoft/Application-Insights-Workbooks/blob/master/schema/workbook.json"}
